entry.title: RT Billyjitsu ⟁: Banger 👇
entry.summary:
RT Billyjitsu ⟁ Banger 👇
koeppelmann.eth 🦉💳: @notjuve Because we want to scale Ethereum, and on Ethereum, contracts—wherever they are—need to be able to message each other. So, if you cannot reliably message from one L2 contract to another L2 contract, those L2s are NOT Ethereum. There is room for liquidity bridges and app-layer

entry.title: RT Gordo: Lovely musicians and labels! SONGS Beta is live and public! @songs_tools An on-chain music distributor is now a reality: • 100% of revenue ...
entry.summary: RT Gordo Lovely musicians and labels! SONGS Beta is live and public! @songs_tools An on-chain music distributor is now a reality: • 100% of revenue goes to the artist • Turn your fans and collaborators into literal stakeholders in your music • And there’s so much more to come! ⬇️⬇️ We’ve been dreaming and building this crazy project throughout 2024. If you’re planning to release music or want to migrate your existing tracks, jump in and test it out. :)) I hear you, we are building this for you, we are building this for us. Artists and fans
